title: (x) Altoids "Arcade" - Alba {Jan, Ignacio}
content:
Anyone know what typeface this is? I assumed it was Bauhaus, but that wasn't right. Then I guessed \<a href=" [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/blippo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143314/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/blippo/)"\>Blippo\</a\>, but that wasn't right either. Any ideas?   
   
 ![Arcade image](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143314im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/34763.jpg)
author: tdominey

comments.content:
I was almost sure this was "Alba", but the "A" is different   
   
 [http://www.fontalicious.com/super/alba.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143314/http:/www.fontalicious.com/super/alba.html)
BAM! That rocks -- thanks guys. And only $15 too. Really fun face.
